thread.title: This video of dancing BSF personnel taking social media by storm
thread.title_full: This video of dancing BSF personnel taking social media by storm

author: FE Online
title: This video of dancing BSF personnel taking social media by storm
text:
This video of dancing BSF personnel taking social media by storm This video of dancing BSF personnel taking social media by storm A video has gone by a video, that has gone viral shows BSF men and women dancing to desi beats. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: March 17, 2017 4:20 PM The video is located from Wagah-Attari border in Punjab, is one of the border crossings that is used by civilians from both countries. (Facebook/ Defence News India) 
The BSF personnel have often been seen marching along with pride and absolute disciple, more so when when we switch on the television to watch Republic Day parade. Their movement is always measured always measured, often leaving civilians appreciating their efforts and activeness 
However, going by a video, that has gone viral in social media sites, BSF men and women also know how to dance to desi beats with as much. 
But if a recent video that’s going viral is anything to go by, then clearly, the men and women in uniform show they even know how to match steps to desi beats with just as much expertise. 
A video titled ‘BSF men and women awesome dance at Attari-Wagah Border’ has been uploaded in a facebook page ‘Defence News India’. 
The video is located from Wagah-Attari border in Punjab, is one of the border crossings that is used by civilians from both countries. Performances like this and other colourful show of art and patriotism are common here, mostly at the Indian side. 
The gate-closing ceremony at the end of the day is one of more popular shows at the border.
